name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Lewis J. HARE, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Lewis J. HARE, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Bruce C. Bankenstein, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
John C. Uhler, Dist. Atty., Sheryl Ann Dorney, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1153
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Lewis J. HARE, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 21, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
Bruce C. Bankenstein, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
John C. Uhler, Dist. Atty., Sheryl Ann Dorney, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
